name: Hook It Up
description:
What Is Hook It Up:

Hook It Up is a casual side-scroller game. Breathe in the cyberpunk atmosphere.

Ultilize the grappling hook at hands. Your goal is to dogde the incoming towers and enemies projectiles, collect the treasures on the path.  Defeat foes with the tools provided. Hone your skill and prove yourself that you will become the best adventurer there is!

    ===================   

How To Play: 

Hold Left Mouse Button: Fire the grappling hook and move straight toward attached point. Charge 1 Nitro bar.

Press Right Mouse Button:  Once the Nitro bar fills up, press right mouse button to dash toward mouse position.

Press Space:  Shield yourself from enemies projectiles. When facing enemies with laser weapon, shield at the right moment to deflect the laser blast. Collect coins to charge shield

                      

Credit: 

Programmer:  Alenca (Tran Cong Phu)

Game Design:  Alenca

Game Art/UI art:  Alenca 

Animation: Alenca

Background Art:  Ansimuz - Warped City

Sound Designer:  Alenca

Music:  LudoWic - Chemical Brew (5Sekeletron Cover/Remix)

This is my first completed game after 3 months learning with Unity (the game is made in one month), it was a nice journey making this game. Thank you for playing!

CONSIDER DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE SINCE UNITY HTML MESS UP MY GAME EFFECT PRETTY BAD!

                                        Alenca
